The Measuretape Approach

The unique nature of every business has led us to be as flexible and adaptable as possible at every level of our working practice. We believe in gathering as much information as is possible about each project, extensively with our clients and listening carefully to their requirements before making full use of our expertise to design and create incredibly efficient and attractive workplaces. Reliability is a Measuretape Interiors trademark, whatever the scale of the project.

Transforming homes into our clients’ dream visions

  • We have a team of professional Interior Designers.
  • Book an appointment with our designer. 
  • Just confirm the meeting on phone or E-mail.
  • Once you confirm the meeting with our telemarketing executive, designer will visit at site on confirmed date & time.
  • Designer will come with a proper checklist to note down all the requirements.
  • Designer will  discuss about the requirements and placements of furniture.
  • The designer  will clear all your doubts and suggest you the best design, space planning & space utilization ideas as per your area.
  • Designer will draw plan and take proper measurements and photographs.
  • Designer will suggest you design ideas, material details and color combinations.
  • In the end of the meeting the designer will tell you the exact carpet area of your site.

2D & 3D Design Services

  • 2D Design – Get 2D Design at just 6.Rs per sq.ft – We provide all 2D measurements & technical plans which includes floor plan with actual and proposed planning, wall elevations, false ceiling plan, electrical plan with legend & wardrobe internals. Ask for sample layout in PDF. 

  • 3D Design – Get 3D Designs at just 10.Rs per sq.ft – We provide high quality 3D rendered images with finished materials & provide details of each and every material which is used in 3D images, like (floor tiles, laminates, wall paint, bedsheet, pillows, curtains & wallpaper). Also includes 2D Measurement Plan. Ask for sample Layout in PDF.

Residential Spaces

Are you planning to decorate, renovate or build your dream home? We can help you create interiors that are a true reflection of you, the residents who call our projects home. Together, we can create the home of your dreams.

Make your dream vision a reality

Your home should be more than just a place you live. It should be a space where you and your family live together to feel relaxation & peace of mind.

If you have any questions, or queries about your project, or you want to get in touch with us for more information on our products, please contact us on the details below.

Get in touch

How do we get anywhere in life without a plan? An efficient one that is. There is so much to consider when embarking on an office shake-up, which is why businesses all over are turning to office planning experts to help them. And it’s one of the smartest decisions you will make. We help you understand what can work with your budgets, adhere to health and safety regulations, and how your brand and industry can better thrive with a specialised work environment. We’re all looking to improve productivity and efficiency, and it starts even in the planning phase.
